title: In Poland, migrants describe help from Belarus forces to cross border amid battle with Europe
content:
1. In Poland, migrants describe help from Belarus forces to cross border amid battle with Europe  The Washington Post
  2. Migrants Say Belarusians Took Them to E.U. Border and Supplied Wire Cutters  The New York Times
  3. Russia has 'nothing to do with' Poland-Belarus border crisis, Putin insists  CNN
  4. Opinion | The leader of Belarus is provoking a border crisis. He must be stopped.  The Washington Post
  5. Belarus threatens to choke off EU gas supply over border dispute  CNBC
contentSnippet:
In Poland, migrants describe help from Belarus forces to cross border amid battle with Europe  The Washington Post
Migrants Say Belarusians Took Them to E.U. Border and Supplied Wire Cutters  The New York Times
Russia has 'nothing to do with' Poland-Belarus border crisis, Putin insists  CNN
Opinion | The leader of Belarus is provoking a border crisis. He must be stopped.  The Washington Post
Belarus threatens to choke off EU gas supply over border dispute  CNBC

localize.title: ポーランドでは、ヨーロッパとの戦いの中、国境を越えるためにベラルーシ軍からの支援を受ける移民たちがいます。
在波兰，移民描述了在与欧洲的斗争中得到白俄罗斯部队的帮助而越过边境的情况
在波蘭，移民描述了在與歐洲的鬥爭中得到白俄羅斯部隊的幫助而越過邊境的情況
